author: Sune Engel Rasmussen
title: Thousands of Civilians Flee Besieged Rebel-Held Enclave in Syria
text:
Thousands of civilians fled Eastern Ghouta on Thursday as Syrian regime forces advanced further into the rebel-held enclave near the capital, while Turkish forces intensified their assault on the Syrian Kurdish city of Afrin in the north.
The unplanned exodus from Ghouta marked a significant gain for Syrian President Bashar al-Assad as he presses to consolidate control around Damascus. Shelling by Turkish forces and their allies represented an escalation of a two-month offensive that has put Ankara at odds with the U.S. and...
